entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, L'Assomption
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 2:00 PM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Temperature: 5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: WNW 25 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low zero with patchy frost.
